QuestData.Title: The Hall of Tomes
QuestData.Description:
Very well, you can have your list. The volumes you seek can be found in the Hall of Tomes.
Now, run back to your master like a good little pet.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the required volumes from the Hall of Tomes and return them to Kel'Thuzad in the Vault of Souls.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Kel'Thuzad in the Vault of Souls.
QuestData.RewardText:
Ah yes, these will do.
It will take some time to study these tomes. In the meantime, I have more need of you.
